page.title: 06School,5 Rds
page.content: A bi-lingual junior school with 45 pupils based on family groupings with 3 teachers including the Headmistress. There is a strong Welsh flavour. Children remain with one teacher for two years or more.A pupil this year is to go to the comprehensive a year early.For the year 1985-1986 ten 4-yr olds are expected to be admitted.A nursery class meets three times a week The usual range of subjects are taught and the school has a computer which all classes use.There is an annual sports day and on St.Davids day a concert is held for parents.There are Urdd activities,this being a Welsh youth movement.The Head likes the children to be confident and encourages self-reliance like -answering the phone.The schools motto is "Dysgwn y ffordd i fyw" which means to learn the way we live.
